artist: Artist: Paul Delvaux; Author: Jacques Meuris; Publisher: Le Soleil Noir
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: softcover book with black-and-white images on cover; text with reproductions in black and white (one fold-out illustration near back in color) of Surrealist images; four black and white and one color etching included
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2017.
title: 7 Dialogues avec Paul Delvaux
